title: Malaysian fintech major TNG Digital eyes IPO in next 2-3 years
description: TNG Digital could potentially fetch the valuation of a unicorn - a startup with a market value of $1 billion or more - before the potential IPO, the sources added.
content: Malaysia's largest fintech company TNG Digital is looking at a potential domestic initial public offering over the next two to three years that could raise over $300 million, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.
cleaned_content: malaysias largest fintech company tng digital is looking at a potential domestic initial public offering over the next two to three years that could raise over <THREE_HUNDRED> million two sources with knowledge of the matter said
